Articles.Content: One day I was building a normal ship wen suddenly i couldn't place anything. I zoomed out and the part i was trying to place was attached to nothing but air. after that I could only press the exit button, no save, no launch, no nothing but exit. Is there a way to fix it not?

What you describe is not expected behaviour, therefore is a bug.

You should open a thread within the "Development & Support" section (either modded or unmoddded install) and also provide any other useful info, compliant to the instructions for either unmodded or modded.

Also, check other threads over there, others may already have reported the same (in that case, you may better add to the same thread, if still open).
